description.zh: Google 提供的数据集搜索引擎，索引全网 2500万+ 数据集，支持跨平台发现
description.en: Google's dataset search engine, indexing 25M+ datasets across the web for cross-platform discovery

authority_justification.zh: Google Research 产品，基于 schema.org/Dataset 标准，覆盖主流数据平台
authority_justification.en: Google Research product, based on schema.org/Dataset standard, covers major data platforms
